page.title: 08SHOPPING IN PETERHEAD
page.content: Our group went into Peterhead's shopping centre and asked people some questions about the shops in Peterhead. Most of them were young mothers or middle-aged women.The general opinion was that the centre could be improved by adding large chain stores like "Marks and Spencers"and also "Mothercare"and by taking away some of the many shoe shops and hairdressers.Most people bought their week's groceries from "Presto"and"Fine Fare"because they are cheaper than the small corner grocery shops.Everyone preferred Aberdeen for clothes as there is a better selection there.We think there should be more modern boutiques with teenage clothes in them.The general public think Peterhead as a shopping centre could be greatly improved.
